duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops and implements sales strategies to achieve maximum revenues and manages the property's catering sales efforts.
Leads and manages the catering sales team, delegates responsibilities, and approves and negotiates contracts.
Builds a local client base through sales calls, prospecting, networking, and referrals, and responds to customer inquiries independently.
Analyzes competition to maintain competitiveness, ensures successful events that meet client needs, and communicates relevant information to appropriate departments.
Prepares all monthly reports for support center including accurate sales forecasts, booking reports, and financial performance verification.
Establishes team and individual sales goals, promotes the restaurant through local networking and organizations, and responds in a timely manner to customer issues.
Provides support and coaching to team members, celebrates team success, and ensures employees are appropriately trained and have an adequate workload.
Wears approved manufacturer certified slip-resistant or non-slip shoes at all times while working.

education_certification.credential: 5 years of progressive, strong sales experience with a catering company, full-service hotel or restaurant, at least 2 of those years being in a director level role.
Experience managing a catering sales team.
Strong catering sales and event planning experience.
Experience in accurate forecasting and preparation of sales plans and financial reports.
